name: SAMURAI COOTS
description:
This is a submission for Ludwigs 2023 game jam  Themed: Coots  STORY In this game you get to follow Samurai Coots on her mission to stop the evil crows from invading her homeland!  GAMEPLAY

This game is inspired by Serkrio shadows die twice´s combat it features precise parries and nice samurai combat

Controls

Move w,a,s,d

Dash left shift or Space

Attack Left Mouse

Parry "Q"

Heal "E"

CREDIT

I made everything in this game from scratch my self
